Setting.Name: Frontend::Output::FilterElementPost###060-OutputDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable
Setting.Description: Alerts Agent about not classified tickets and suggest smart classification based on ticket content and past tickets.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###Header
Setting.Description: Ao inserir todos os registros clique no botão "Salvar".

Value.Item: Ao inserir todos os registros clique no botão "Salvar".

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###WhenNotClassified
Setting.Description: Wheter to expand or collapse Smart Classification Widget when ticket is not classified

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###WhenClassified
Setting.Description: Wheter to expand or collapse Smart Classification Widget when ticket is classified

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###002-Ligero
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Navigation###AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###002-Ligero
Setting.Description: Main menu item registration.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the ticket free text screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###SmartClassification
Setting.Description: WARNING: YOU NEED LIGERO SMART INSTALLED AND CONFIGURED, OTHERWISE YOU HAVE AN ERRO ON YOUR SYSTEM. Enables Smart Classification based on queue history for type, service and SLA.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###RequiredLock
Setting.Description: Defines if a ticket lock is required in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###TicketType
Setting.Description: Sets the ticket type in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface (Ticket::Type needs to be activated).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###Service
Setting.Description: Sets the service in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface (Ticket::Service needs to be activated).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###ServiceMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if service must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###SLAMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if SLA must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###Queue
Setting.Description: Sets the queue in the ticket free text screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###Owner
Setting.Description: Sets the ticket owner in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###OwnerMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if ticket owner must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###Responsible
Setting.Description: Sets the responsible agent of the ticket in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###State
Setting.Description: If a note is added by an agent, sets the state of a ticket in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###StateType
Setting.Description: Defines the next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###StateDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###Note
Setting.Description: Allows adding notes in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface. Can be overwritten by Ticket::Frontend::NeedAccountedTime.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###NoteMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if note must be filled in by the agent. Can be overwritten by Ticket::Frontend::NeedAccountedTime.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###Subject
Setting.Description: Defines the default subject of a note in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###Body
Setting.Description: Defines the default body of a note in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###InvolvedAgent
Setting.Description: Shows a list of all the involved agents on this ticket, in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###InformAgent
Setting.Description: Shows a list of all the possible agents (all agents with note permissions on the queue/ticket) to determine who should be informed about this note, in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###ArticleTypeDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default type of the note in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###ArticleTypes
Setting.Description: Specifies the available note types for this ticket mask. If the option is deselected, ArticleTypeDefault is used and the option is removed from the mask.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###Priority
Setting.Description: Shows the ticket priority options in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###PriorityDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default ticket priority in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###Title
Setting.Description: Shows the title fields in the ticket free text screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###HistoryType
Setting.Description: Defines the history type for the ticket free text screen action, which gets used for ticket history.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###HistoryComment
Setting.Description: Defines the history comment for the ticket free text screen action, which gets used for ticket history.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###RichTextWidth
Setting.Description: Defines the width for the rich text editor component for this screen. Enter number (pixels) or percent value (relative).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDynamicFieldRemoteDBTable###RichTextHeight
Setting.Description: Defines the height for the rich text editor component for this screen. Enter number (pixels) or percent value (relative).

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AdminDynamicFieldRemoteDB
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AdminDynamicFieldRemoteDB###002-DynamicFieldRemoteDB
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Navigation###AdminDynamicFieldRemoteDB###002-DynamicFieldRemoteDB
Setting.Description: Main menu item registration.

Setting.Name: DynamicFields::Driver###RemoteDB
Setting.Description: DynamicField backend registration.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###DynamicFieldRemoteDBAJAXHandler
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Navigation###DynamicFieldRemoteDBAJAXHandler###002-DynamicFieldRemoteDB
Setting.Description: Main menu item registration.

Setting.Name: CustomerFrontend::Module###DynamicFieldRemoteDBAJAXHandler
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the customer interface.

Setting.Name: CustomerFrontend::Navigation###DynamicFieldRemoteDBAJAXHandler###002-DynamicFieldRemoteDB
Setting.Description: Main menu item registration.
